title: Football Travel Operations Assistant
job_overview:
We’re looking for someone who lives and breathes football. You must know the sport, follow matches, and understand how it works — not just the big clubs, but also smaller leagues and matches. If you’re not into football, this job is not for you.

This job is about managing and updating our football travel packages. That includes:

Updating prices for football matches

Monitoring price changes across many different games

Creating new match pages (based on our template)

Keeping everything organized and always up to date

If you're structured, independent, and proactive – this is a big plus.
Strong communication in English is a must.
We value people who take initiative and spot opportunities without being told.

???? Bonus: If you're good, there will be opportunities to handle customer service and grow your role.
???? To show you've read the full post, please write your favorite football club at the top of your application.

We’re excited to welcome someone who wants to grow with us in the football industry!
